title: Classic titling font
content:
Looking for what font this may have been based on.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tiffany.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018053431/http:/typophile.com/files/tiffany.jpg) | 20.72 KB |
author: brianj1400

comments.content:
Tiffany's custom typeface, Sterling, was designed by Hoefler & Frere-Jones. See [this page](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018053431/http:/designarchives.aiga.org/entry.cfm/eid_640). I'd guess this logo was derived from these letters and possibly done for them by H&FJ.

- Mike Yanega
